customPrompts.customRemoteMessage: 🐝 Please enter git path of your custom template
customPrompts.empty: 😱 What do you want? Empty address?????

copy.start: 😋 Start Copy template from default template
copy.finish: 🎉 Finish Copying template from default template

npm.npmInstall: 🚗 please run npm install before npm run dev

root.successfully: 🎉 Create project successfully! Now you can enter

yo.title: Yeoman command
yo.implement: yo mint                                Execute in the root directory, initialize Project
yo.tc: yo mint:tc                             Clone remote template configuration file to generator
yo.sc: yo mint:sc                             Set remote template profile download path
yo.list: yo mint:tpl / yo mint:tpl list         View template configuration
yo.add_tpl: yo mint:tpl add                        Add template configuration
yo.move_tpl: yo mint:tpl move                       Move the template to the specified position
yo.export_tpl: yo mint:tpl export                     Export template to desktop

project.title: Project command
project.startUp: npm run dev     Local development start command
project.lint: npm run lint    Local eslint check

tc.oraStar: Start downloading template files from remote:

sc.input: Please enter a custom download path
sc.empty: 😱 What do you want? Empty address?????

add.name: Please enter your template name (template project name is recommended)
add.emptyName: 😱 You have to enter a name?
add.emptyUrl: 😱 You have to enter a URL?

move.emptyNum: 😱 You have to enter a number？
move.only: 😱 Currently, there is only one template, and it does not need to be moved~~
move.exceedNumMax: 😱 The value you entered cannot exceed the maximum value
move.exceedNumMin: 😱 The value you entered cannot exceed the minimum value
move.unchange: The position to be moved is the same as the current position
